personalMessage.title: A Message from Governor Baker
personalMessage.rte: "Information technology is an important priority for this administration and our ability to provide secure essential services and execute projects in an efficient and fiscally responsible manner is key to a better state government for Massachusetts. This is an important step that not only addresses some of the problems we have, but is an essential way forward to a better future."

items.description: Choosing iconography for the Transportation page got a little complicated when...
When you redesign a website like Mass.Gov, you have to think about a lot of...
Added 4 new Actions - Apply for a Fishing License, Find a State Park, Pay for Child Support, Register Your Business
Added 2 new Actions - Get a Driver’s License, Apply for SNAP
Added 2 new Agency pages - Department of Conservation and Recreation (DCR), Office of Health and Social Services (OHSS)

feedbackForm.title: Have Feedback for Us?
feedbackForm.description: Mass.gov is for you, and we want to know what you think about it.
feedbackForm.permissionLegend: Are you interested in helping us test our designs for new sections of Mass.Gov? If so, we will contact you by email with more information.
